__e: The drop is still the best way to catch these guys, and he agrees with that.
Whatever it is... money for a painting, drugs, or a person... the hand-off's always a problem.
Stand down, stand down, stand down.
Before I hand over the keys I do have one condition.
This fairy hired me to exchange a necklace for cash.
I could send the sheriff over there today and make you do it, but my client insists that we... handle the exchange of custody quietly.
Handing over the pilot may have stopped some of the bleeding for a bit, but this morning's incident means that votes for this treaty are going to be very hard to obtain.
The exchange of the virus hasn't happened yet. We expect it at any moment.
